alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:51PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Dona Ana County through 515 PM MDT... At 450 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of San Miguel, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vado, San Miguel, Mesquite, La Mesa, Afton Generating Plant and High Valley. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 145 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley
